name: Modern Times Group MTG AB
goal:
MTG is an international entertainment company and we produce, buy and show entertainment.

You find our channels in over 130 countries, and we offer everything from the best TV series from the US to premium live sports like the Champions League and Formula 1 and locally produced series, reality TV and comedy, and even some of the worldâ€™s best eSports.

It goes without saying that our content is available both on linear TV channels and on your terms, on demand, online.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Information Society, Internal Market, Sport, Trade
euInitiatives: MTG's main focus is on the Digital Single Market including copyright, geoblocking, AVMS revision, spectrum, Cable and Satellite Directive, Telecoms regulation including net neutrality, Data Protection, Competition, consumer rights and e-commerce.
